SEARCH
Package Models

Class StaffManager

java.lang.Object
Models.StaffManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaffInterface
public class StaffManager extends Object implements StaffInterface
The StaffManager class manages a collection of staff records. It handles operations such as adding, removing, updating, and viewing staff information, as well as managing staff credentials (user IDs and passwords). The staff data is stored in CSV files, and operations are synchronized to ensure thread safety.

The staff data is stored in a CSV file with the header: "Staff ID, Name, Role, Gender, Age". Additionally, user credentials are stored in a separate CSV file with the header: "Hospital ID, Password".

Staff records are represented by the Staff class, and staff credentials are handled as pairs of hospital ID and password.

Since:
2024-11-21
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffManager

      public StaffManager(String csvFilePath)
      Constructs a StaffManager instance and initializes file paths for the staff and user CSV files. If the staff CSV file does not exist, it creates the file with the appropriate header.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - The path to the staff CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(String path)
      Initializes the StaffManager, setting the paths for the staff and user CSV files and creating them if they do not exist. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety during initialization.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the staff CSV file.

    • getStaffByID

      public static Staff getStaffByID(String staffId)
      Retrieves a staff member by their unique staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The unique staff ID.
      Returns:
      The Staff object corresponding to the staff ID, or null if no such staff member is found.

    • addStaff

      public static boolean addStaff(String name, String role, String gender, int age)
      Adds a new staff member with the specified details and assigns them a hospital ID and default password. This method also updates the user list with the new staff member's credentials.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the staff member.
      role - The role of the staff member (e.g., doctor, pharmacist).
      gender - The gender of the staff member.
      age - The age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      True if the staff member was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeStaff

      public static void removeStaff(String StaffID)
      Removes a staff member from both the staff records and user credentials list.
      Parameters:
      StaffID - The unique ID of the staff member to be removed.

    • updateStaff

      public static boolean updateStaff(String staffID, String name, String role, String gender, int age)
      Updates the details of a staff member in the hospital database. This includes updating the staff's name, role, gender, and age. If the staff member is not found, the update is not performed.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The unique ID of the staff member to be updated.
      name - The new name of the staff member.
      role - The new role of the staff member.
      gender - The new gender of the staff member.
      age - The new age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      True if the staff member's details were successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • viewStaffList

      public static void viewStaffList()
      Displays the list of all staff members in the hospital, including their ID, name, role, gender, and age. It ensures that no staff member is printed more than once.

    • updatePassword

      public static boolean updatePassword(String hospitalID, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a hospital user. The password is updated if the hospital ID exists in the user list.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user whose password needs to be updated.
      newPassword - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      True if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPassword

      public static String getCurrentPassword(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves the current password for a hospital user.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user whose password is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The current password of the user, or null if the hospital ID is not found.
